com.fasterxml.clustermate.client

Class StoreClientConfig<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type of keys used for retrieving entries from Store
    CONFIG - Recursive definition needed due to Java Generics oddities: sub-class of this base class

    public abstract class StoreClientConfig<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>>
extends Object
    Base class for configuration types used with StoreClient implementations.

      static long DELAY_BETWEEN_RETRY_ROUNDS_MSECS
      Add modest amount of delay between rounds of calls when we have failures, just to reduce congestion during overloads
      static int MAX_RETRIES_FOR_DELETE
      This is just a simple "just-in-case" threshold to prevent message flooding with retries.
      static int MAX_RETRIES_FOR_GET
      This is just a simple "just-in-case" threshold to prevent message flooding with retries.
      static int MAX_RETRIES_FOR_PUT
      This is just a simple "just-in-case" threshold to prevent message flooding with retries; if things won't work with 5 retries (and initial try, meaning 6 calls), we are probably hosed enough to give up individual operations.
      static long MIN_DELAY_BETWEEN_STATUS_CALLS_MSECS
      Limit calls for cluster status to once every two seconds

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_RETRIES_FOR_PUT

        public static final int MAX_RETRIES_FOR_PUT
        This is just a simple "just-in-case" threshold to prevent message flooding with retries; if things won't work with 5 retries (and initial try, meaning 6 calls), we are probably hosed enough to give up individual operations.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_RETRIES_FOR_GET

        public static final int MAX_RETRIES_FOR_GET
        This is just a simple "just-in-case" threshold to prevent message flooding with retries. Assuming client can still retry operation, use slightly lower value than for PUTs
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_RETRIES_FOR_DELETE

        public static final int MAX_RETRIES_FOR_DELETE
        This is just a simple "just-in-case" threshold to prevent message flooding with retries. Since DELETEs are bit more disposable, let's use lower limit as well.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_DELAY_BETWEEN_STATUS_CALLS_MSECS

        public static final long MIN_DELAY_BETWEEN_STATUS_CALLS_MSECS
        Limit calls for cluster status to once every two seconds
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DELAY_BETWEEN_RETRY_ROUNDS_MSECS

        public static final long DELAY_BETWEEN_RETRY_ROUNDS_MSECS
        Add modest amount of delay between rounds of calls when we have failures, just to reduce congestion during overloads
        See Also:
